description: Attempted operation not supported by the object. Common with unmodifiable collections or unimplemented abstract methods.
commonCauses: Calling deprecated APIs marked as unsupported
Using legacy Collection methods on modern types
solutions: Use mutableListOf() instead of listOf() when mutations needed
Check if collection supports operation before calling
Use appropriate collection type for use case
Read API documentation for supported operations
prevention: Prefer Kotlin's collection type system (List vs MutableList)
Implement all abstract methods in subclasses
Use sealed classes instead of throwing UnsupportedOperationException
Test with both mutable and immutable collections
Follow Kotlin conventions for collection mutability
